title: Does Riot not have a sense of humor?
body:
Game 1
A Dimwit: %%%%%% %%%got
A Dimwit: yay my chat restriction ended



All it took was 1 game to put me back on chat restriction...
Obviously this was a joke

replies.body: Additional context required.  Riot doesn't take hate speech as a joke.

And those were your first choice words post chat restrictions?  That's actually hilarious XD
Looks like the answer is no then; doesn't seem like a joke to me either.
You'll have to work through them all over again and be more careful in the future :/

That's not going to help...
I think either dragging your chat off-screen or removing your enter key functionality entirely would work better for in-game.
What if I use a script that'll just flat out remove the chat

You should contact player support to ask first.  Idk if they'll give you a hard answer.
That sounds like a plan to get you banned for scripts/3rd-party programs.

> [{quoted}](name=Pentarina Only,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nFvcAcbB,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-21T21:34:45.474+0000)
>
> What if I use a script that'll just flat out remove the chat

if you're talking about using autohotkey to unbind enter. yes thats fine

We also don't know without the OP's added context whether or not the chat was clipped.
League chat only has intent; we can't hear the person's voice nor read their body language.  There's nothing else to go on.  Therefore the chat by default must represent the player, and is what people get punished for (other than in-game actions ofc.)
Please don't trivialize the weight of words.

> [{quoted}](name=TrustworthyDude,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=nFvcAcbB,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-02-21T22:47:12.331+0000)
>
> The concept of hate speech, like hate crimes, is misguided, as their intention is to punish people for their motive, rather than whatever crime they may or may not have committed. You cannot prove this player, however odious or offensive, felt hatred when he wrote those comments. Do not trivialise such an egregiously offensive and antisocial display as the language used here by declaring it "hate speech".

We don't have to know what anyone's personal motivation is for saying the N word. it's hate speech.  And everyone that hasn't been living under a rock knows that going in.   So just don't say it or any other hate speech.  Just don't.  How difficult is that to understand?
One would think you'd know the rules already.

This post is so badly written i have no idea what it means.
Since it looks like a kid salting about deserved restriction: logs or gtfo.
Hate speech is grabbed by the auto system if somebody reported you usually. Unless you got escalated to a ban that's probably the case here as well.
